<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get a currency rate by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/crm/currency/rates/{id:[0-9]+}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a currency rate by ID.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"description":"Currency rate ID","type":"integer"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Currency rate","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"FromCurrency":{"type":"string","example":"EUR"},"ToCurrency":{"type":"string","example":"USD"},"Rate":{"type":"number","format":"double","example":"1.1"},"ID":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1234"}},"title":"CurrencyRateWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
